oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - #52 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Don Helms (performer) listed as show #52 from series 2 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Don Helms
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statements (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- Just When I Needed You (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces Don Helms -- Steel Guitar Stomp (Don Helms steel) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- I'll Fly Away (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Louis Buck and Hank Williams) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Helms, Don (Guitarist);
